new journal!

mymorningprayer............read and be filled!

comment and ill add you.........if you want?

been like two months!

i got a radio show, every thursday from 4:30 - 6:30.
got a gf, lost her, got her, lost her......[to be cont'd?!]
single for the moment......not like any of you care!
chuck is a G!!
thanks to sallie for dumping my arse, otherwise i wouldnt have met the coolest guy i know.
i got my truck
i fixed my truck
I DROVE MY TRUCK!
im cool with everything, i mean things are alright the way they are.
talked to some ppl that i havent talked to in a while.
i apologized to some ppl that i should have done a long time ago.
the family is good. [including all the 13 bros and sis's]
got ungrounded, doing good in school, all A's and B's.
get to hang out now, so if any of you want to take up a slot of my time...call me
not much else is going on......just lonely.....but hey whats new?

why is it that people admit the things ive wanted to hear for the longest time
.....when its too late to matter?
why must i always let everything murder me?
why am i so alone?

whisper in my ear,
all the sweet nothings that you never meant.
lay in the grass and watch the stars,
while you tell me what ive done wrong again.
sometimes i think that you honestly try and drown me,
when you leave me standing in the rain.
sometimes i want to just smother you
and watch you stuggle for your next breath.
hush little baby dont you cry
now im gonna sing you a lullaby
and when i sing that song off key
i guess ill have to buy you a diamond ring
and if that fucking ring dont shine
ill shove it down your ungreatful throat
i mean damn i sang to you and its not enough?
i bought you a ring and that means nothing?
if you have something to say, make it quick
our time is running out.

these pills arent working anymore
my guts are spilling out onto the floor
of a nightmare, you wouldnt believe
of a nightmare, you could not concieve
month till my birf-dae!  what you gonna get me you fuckers?!

i gave you all i ever had, but it was just a book of empty words.
so now ill smoke my pain away, and find the an endless bottle.
maybe someday it will work out, but as for now.
i miss pretending everything was okay.

why cant anything go right in my life, the shit has hit that fan here at the brock house hold.  im not waiting till the first of the year, im leaving as soon as possible.  now its a matter of safety.  i cant stay.  or ill kill him.

krista is the coolest girl in my english class.

[did i spell your name right?!]
do you know how much it hurt to utter those two words?  i hate myself.

well i think now i can finally be happy whith who i am.  its been so long, just fuck it.  if you dont like me for who ive become, then you werent worth my time in the first place.   i see all of my friends changing, some for better, and some for worse.  i just quit everything.  i wanted to be happy for so long, i had forgotten what i was fighting for.  in a little bit, i can be who i want to be.  and nobody can stop me.

what the hell was today?!  i mean i actually enjoyed spending time with the family.  and then i come home and feel like shit, as usual, but nobody fucking wants to talk to me.  everyone wants to put their two cents in on how big of an asshole i am.  i know im an asshole, i dont need reminders.  no matter what i do, its never good enough for you.  ive been missing someone a lot lately, and everone has their opinions as to who it is.  i swear i cant get her off of my mind.  i know how it will end up, just like it did the last time.  with me all broken, and alone.  but thats how i am most of the time.  i dont care what anyone says anymore, i dont care if they talk shit about me.  ill turn and laugh, cause they are wasting their time on making fun and running their mouths.  none of you fuckers will be here in a year, in 9 months.  hell if i stay that long.  and as of right now, i can think of one reason to stay, but i dont think i'll actually have that reason.  it would make my day to have a reason to not go, and leave everyone/thing ive ever known and loved.  all my memories are here, no place else.  i dont want to, but i have to.  self-preservation, if i want to stay me i have to go.  im slowly beginning to realize that every reason i had for staying, is now turning into a reason to leave.  i cant help but fuck relationships up.  im sorry.  what else can i say?

First..get a pen and paper. When you actually
choose names, make sure it's people you actually
know and go with your first instinct.

Scroll down one line at a time...and don't read
ahead or you'll ruin it!














1. First, write the numbers 1 through 11 in a
column.














2. Then, beside numbers 1 and 2, write down any
two numbers you want.












3. Beside the 3 and 7, write down the names of
members of the opposite sex.












NO LOOKING AHEAD...OR IT WON"T TURN OUT RIGHT!




4. Write anyone's name (like friends or
family....) in the 4th, 5th, and 6th spots.












5. Write down four song titles in 8,9,10, and 11.












GO WITH YOUR INSTINCT PEOPLE!!!!




6. Finally, make a wish.













And now the key for the game.....






1. You must tell (the number in space 2) people about this game.













2. The person in space 3 is the one that you love.












3. The person in 7 is one you like but can't ever seem to work out.












4. You care most about the person you put in 4.













5. The person you name in number 5 is the one who knows you very well.













6. The person you name in 6 is your lucky star.













7. The song in 8 is the song that matches with the person in number 3.












8. The title in 9 is the song for the person in 7














9. The tenth space is the song that tells you most about YOUR mind.













10. and 11 is the song telling you how you feel about life







NOW...post this bulletin (dont reply) within the
hour... IF you do..
your wish will come true...
If you don't it will become the opposite...

not much has gone on here, got a gf, broke up with her.  shes pissed at me, cause she doesnt have the facts straight.  she just believes the first thing she hears.  doesnt even check to see if its okay.  but oh well, i wanted to be friends.  but shes being pissy right now, and all depressed about it.  she has a right to be mad at me, but not everyone else.  im just sick of this, i dont even know if im gonna wait til june to move.  i think im gonna leave in january like my original plan was.  damned drama!  she says that it hurts her, how does she think i feel?  how do i sleep at night without it?  how can i be all i am without her?



now, on a lighter note!  i wore a purple dress shirt today with a black tie.  i liked it, oddly enough.  i think im gonna do that more often.  i didnt go to cousino today, i just chilled in freitags class 4th hour, and then i went to schades class for 5th.  it was cool, we made fun of all the dumbasses in her class.  my sister monica came up for the weekend, and shes still here!  i missed hanging out with her, shawns a good guy.  me and him just fuck off and play video games a lot.  my niece lydia is sooooo cute, i see her and it reminds me of how much i want kids!  but thats a whole nother story!



man im tired as a mofo, i kept telling her i wasnt sleepy.  but once i hung up, i was out.  i didnt want to let her go, i didnt want to hang up.  i swear im better than this, i know i am.  why am i doing this, i know its wrong.  i tell her all the time, i tell her everyday.  but i dont care, i dont know how else to feel.



more family came up on sunday, my brother jody, his wife, his kids [kayla, and micheal]  and kaylas friend allie.  i took the kids to the park and we played around, it made me sad  cause i think of how badly i want to be a father.  it made me sadder when i thought about why i dont have a family, and when i used to play on the swings.  i dont want my kids to look back and think about their childhoods and regret everything about it.  i want them to say [those were the best years of my life, i have the best dad in the world].  i know ill be a good daddy.  its making me miss some people right about now.  so i think ill leave it on that note.  and for what its worth, im sorry.

Adopt Your Own Emo Kid!
okay this is soooooooooooo me! i love it!!!! its so cool.

and now that i have officially fucked everything up what is left?!  nobody.

[i just want these cuts and scars to go away and not remind me of anything, but evertime they start to i magically appear with more.  and i have no true friends, but i see this beautiful switch blade that i want to become intimate with.  and i think we will]

is this what im reduced to?  is this all that i have?  i used to think i had more to look forward to, but now that i dont have her...i know that i am nothing.  everytime i try and be happy for a while, i end up screwing myself over.  and apparently its all my fault, now she and i arent talking at all.  i made a simple comment, i was bored, i wanted to know that she cared, i didnt want to hurt her when im gone, is that a crime?  is it wrong if i never have what i want?  not having her must be right, otherwise why would it hurt so much.  and all you do is sit and read this and think[oh poor nick, hes depressed again].  but you're wrong, im dying.  without my life, i slowly die each day without her.  and i barely know her, so i must move on and find someone to take my mind off of her.  does anyone want to be that person?!  i didnt think so.

well, life was good about 5 months ago.  and it got a little better, then aroung june it all went downhill from there.  straight to the shitter.  now i got this girl that i really like, but cant do anything with.  shes older, and i had this major crush on her for the longest time.  but i dont know what the hell happened, i told her how i felt.  and now im a complete mess, i dont want to wake up in the morning i dont eat i dont sleep[as if i ever did before] i dont want to be anywhere.  i see all these people making out in the halls and all i want to do is die, im so fucking dead right now.  i honestly wouldnt care if you walked up to me and punched me in the face.  and im  not saying that im like this because of her, but i dont know.  it all started when i realized how much i liked her.  but nothing will happen, she doesnt like me like that, and she doesnt want to go out with a guy thats still in high school.  ive been stoned for damn near the past week straight.  i dont want to live here anymore, i come home and all i do is get screamed at.  and then they dont understand why i want to die.  school is okay, i used to like it.  now its gay, i have all these cute girls in my classes.  and i know i have no shot whatsoever with any of them.  all these guys tell me to get a fuck buddy, but i cant.  im not that kind of guy, i cant just fuck someone and leave them.  no matter what, you mean something to the other person.  thats why youre doing what you are.  ive been writing songs again, they are all depressing and gay.  i want to record this one song for that girl i like, but i have no way of doing so.  and i want to make her happy, make someone happy.  but i cant even make myself happy.  out of nowhere i just start crying, and i cant stop.  i want to i just cant, if it doesnt quit soon i dont know what im gonna do to myself.  i dont want to leave alone, but i always seem to let you down.  these feelings i cant keep inside, for so long ive been empty.  so take a look at what you've left behind, take a look at what you've done to me.  all the things that used to make me happy dont anymore, and the ones who used to make me happy.  are gone.  im so lonely, so depressed, so empty that im angry.  im so angry that i want to hurt someone.  i want to hurt someone so bad that i cant, because i know if i do i wont stop.  so i hurt myself.  and the more i hurt myself the less i want to be me.  so i sleep at night and dream of being somebidy else.  but my dreams dont last long, they are always followed by a void that i cant escape.  thats life for me, short lived happiness followed by endless nothings.  and thats all ill ever be, an endless nothing.  always there[endless], but never to be loved, touched, noticed, hell even spat on[nothing].  i want to end it all and leave you broken in the wake of my memories.  but i cant, im not that kind of person.  everything i want is put on hold, due to your feelings.  and i dont care, i have always put you before me.  and that will never change.

oh, and im offline for the next forever, dont bother calling i wont answer.  if you want to talk to me, grow some balls and come see me.  nobody goes out of their way for me anymore, i miss that like you wouldnt believe.  if anyone gives a shit, tell me.

who am i to need you when im down?
and where are you when i need you around?
can you forgive me for all the things i've said?
what did i do to make you so upset?
and if i could take it back i would.
but you were never there to belong to me.

wow, life has sucked since the last forever.  i keep going for what i cant get, even after i KNOW i cant get it.  im so confused about what im gonna do with the rest of me, i say the rest of me for a reason.  everyone i know, all i have loved, that have left me, have taken what they wanted from me.  then walked away, and nobody knows what its like inside my head, it hurts to have that happen.  and yet i keep going after it, i love being hurt.  i cant live without my pain, its the broken heartedness that keeps me going.  thats why im not happy with being happy.  thats why i always fuck everything up.  its that drive for self-destruction that makes me get attached, to fall in love and then rip out my heart.  and unfortunately, demolish others in my path.  but thats me and i honestly dont give a fuck.  if i hurt you, get over it.  and now that im not in love with anyone anymore.  zoja, sallie, micah.....pretty much everyone i have loved, is gone.  my mom, my family....my home.  the one who makes me stay up at night and wonder what i could have done.  the one who makes me feel all tingly inside, i cant stand being near her.  i cant stand hearing her voice, seeing her in my dreams.  dont call, dont try and talk to me in any way, shape, or form.  just leave me the fuck alone.  i know im about to rip your heart out too.  so to keep you from pain, or feeling like shit, or making you regret doing what you did, leave me alone.  i dont know you, dont want to know you.  and i dont care if i wake up tomorrow, i dont care if i cry anymore, or who sees me do it.  cause without my tears i have nothing, cause you have taken it all.  every night i stayed up and talked to you, helped you through your problems, meanwhile im dying inside.  i talk you through it all, make you laugh, make you cry, make you feel flattered.  when i do things that get me in trouble just so i can see you.  and everytime i talk to you, i compliment you.  i go out of my way just so i can have a chance to catch a glimpse or your beautiful face.  just so that you can realize how wonderful i really am, to show you i really would do anything to make you happy.  but all that effort is in vain, because apparently ill never be good enough for you.  everything i am isn't ANYTHING that you need.  im never good enough for anyone.  im not good enough for this world, not good enough for family.  but thats changing, my brother[hal] called my other brother[manuel] and talked to him, and my brother[jody].  then they called my sister[monica] and told her that they wanted to talk to me.  they actaully want to get to know me.  so i am good enough for family.  and yet again, someone i dont know that well cares more about me than the rest of you.

wow, life sucks big ass.  i dont know why i do the things i do, but they always make me unhappy after i do them.  life blows.  i talked to zoja, again, and said some shit that i knew i shouldnt have.  god i love her.  but now its like family kind of love.  im over her, although it was fun being under her[whole nother story].  tonight is the first night that we talked that i didnt feel all giddy and happy that we talked.  skoo, was coo.  i guess, i saw this girl allie.  she was in drama club back in 8th, she was in 6th tho.  yeah shes a freshman...she changed A LOT.  then for some reason, i looked at mazzengas comments today, and saw jessica seba on there.  so i talked with her for a while.  shes cool, i had her number all summer, and never called.  kinda wished i did, dont know her that well.  she was oddly nice to me, and thats always fun.  shes insanely hott, and she said i was too.  that made me feel better.  a lot of girls have been saying i look hott.  its starting to go to my head, so stop it.  i liked it better when everyone heard of me, but didnt know me.  that was fun, the stories ppl make up.  geesh, well anyhoo.  single, and want to keep it that way.  damn girls with their sexy sexy bodies, making my eyes wonder.  with the shaking of the hips, and the bouncing and what not.............god i need a woman.  speaking of women, i saw laura tirla today.  and amanda..........i can never remember her last name tho.  and megan, and sara[h],hehehe, and britnay, and dezzy.  and nikki krotzer, and sallie.  and queen,i think it was her, stacy, renee king.  yeah pretty much every girl in here i had/have the hotts for.  but if any of you ask me, my answer will be [had].  and last night i talked to my kay-tea [stolen from z] ha but im keeping it.  we were goofing around and some how we got on the subject of sex.  so that was fun, and then she said dorm room and guy allowed.  so you KNOW she had my attention, turns out she was talking about this girl that graduated last year.  and id do her, PLUS this girl is looking for a guy....[hint hint wink wink, kay-tea pay attention to previous statement].  yeah this entire entry is about girls, and now i feel all funny inside.  butterflies?!  which girl do i feel these for?  spin the wheel and see who wins the grand prize!!! ME!!!  yeah, youre right.  whoever wins, is getting majorly screwed.  but anyways the feeling in the stomach is probably just the taco bell acting up.  damn mexicans!!  well garsh, im gonna shut up before all the girls i know read this and get pissed at me.  so..........
[toodles]

I LOVE SALLIE ANN MATIKA WITH ALL OF MY HEART, AND THAT WONT CHANGE.  AS LONG AS I HAVE AIR IN MY BODY, I WILL LOVE HER.

wow last day of summer and none of you fuckers came through.  i had 7 people stand me up today when we had plans.  i woke up and knew today was gonna suck ass.  i swear, i need a drink.  fuck anyone want to sneak out tonight and TRY and make my day?  i just need someone to show me how i can end life and let everyone know that its alright.  life has really sucked lately, home is nowhere to be found.  im so confused with girls and shit.  i just want to thank zoja for calling me damn near everynight and listening to my bullshit.  i swear as much as she helped me i hope that i helped her out half as much.  and to nikki, ha i finally told you what i wanted to for years.  and now im just all [what the fuck] about everything tho.  sallie, you make me feel.........oh so very.......well anyhoo.  jesse, were fucking brothers.  craze, everyone knows were the fucking anti mexican mexicans.  i just love tacos, is that a crime?  josh, you were there to let me get fucked up at your house, and sumpter, you were there to......well, generally make me feel creeped out.  cis, you guys rock.  stacy, your too cool for school.  katie, you stuck by me this whole summer, and i probably wouldnt have gotten through it without you.  chuck, im kinda glad me and sallie broke up[not the fact that we did, but i would never actually talked to you], who else would ask me to go somewhere everyday, and have me tell them i cant. EVERYDAY.  mazzenga, your my little buddy.  and thanks for having that show at your house.  megan, i love you, the last couple of days when i was pissy you listened.  laura, when zoja dumped my ass, you listened and actually pretended to give a shit.  mikalonius deeanopolis, you always made me laugh.  and everyone else, thank you for talking to me.  if i didnt mention you, we didnt talk that much.  and half the people i listed dont even know i have a lj.  oh well, if they see it they do, if not joke em' if they cant take a fuck.



[p.s. megan, let me know if you passed your road test.]

fucking shoot me, why am i alone?  why cant i be with my happiness, why must i always die inside everyday when i wake up?  life just isnt any fun anymore, why am i still living it?  what the hells the point, who out there gives a shit if i go away?  fuck it in a couple of months i am leaving.  all i know here will be in my past, im going somewhere so that none of you can find me.  ever again.

Balaholic87: I wuv you.
fauxkissed x: ummmmmmm
fauxkissed x: i wuv you too
Balaholic87: Score.

sorry i had to put that, it was great.  well im off to a show now, so ill be back later.

i have a question, why is it that we[as a people] always want something better than what we have?  why cant we be content with what is given to us, why must we chase after all the things we know we cant have?  the things we think are better, the things that wont make us as happy as what we have.  well i dont know about you but, im sick of destroying the things i have.  breaking, and tearing, and yelling and screaming.  hurting and regreting.  always regreting, and if we can not learn from our mistakes, we are doomed.  but i need to realize that no matter how much im dying inside without happiness, my home, my love, my green eyed angel, life [unfortunately] will go on without her.  and the detours in the road back to her are gonna be long and difficult, but when i make it, it will be worth the wait.  you say im stupid, i say no.  you say im crazy, i say so.  but you tell me you love me, i always seem to say go.  in my heart i am screaming stay, i am yelling, i am exclaiming, how much i need you by how much i never let you in.  and everytime you cry, i am ashamed.  i am worthless, i am just average.  ill never be anything special to anyone i want to be something to again.  ill float on my coffin, on my way to die.  ill fly into the sun, every second wanting to cry.

well............
damn, been a long time since i been here.  not much, just got grounded.  got ungrounded, life sucks a big ass.  im self-centered, dont even mean to be, i just am.  but not like anybody wants to hear me whine, i do that too fucking much.  oh well, what the fuck can you do about it.  its my one month anniversary thingy with sallie, tomorrow.  yipee, have seen her in forever.  two weeks to be exact, well i saw her for like 5 mins today at the dream cruise.  but then corey started pouting, and this guy ryan[i just want to kick his ass] started complaining about being there.  so, oh well.  everyone just piss nick off tonight.  its okay, fuck each and every one of you.  i mean it.  fuck, my family, friends, all of you.  go to hell, burn, rot, decay, and have worms and fire demons infest your slowly rotting bodies.

fuck off

well sallie got back yesterday, so she and krystal came over.  they talked about up north for awhile.  they told me about their boyfriends up there[dont ask].  and i really missed her, i wanted to go with them.  she gave me my presents, a necklace and a pair of handcuffs[wow she knows me too well].  anyhoo we hung out, then mike craze came over.  then we all went into my beautiful newly redone room, i played guitar for them for a while.  then sallie got lonely, so went and layed down with her.
